name: Timeline Pro
author: pluginspoint

sections.description:
Timeline Pro is pure HTML & CSS timeline style grid for WordPress. Very lightweight, Responsive and easy to use anywhere via short-codes, control timeline multiple post type via admin settings panel. use your color to match theme. Social share icon to share timeline post to most popular social network site. beautiful ajax load more timeline post and comments.

  • Live Preview
  • Support

Plugin Features

  • Use via shortcode.
  • Display any post type.
  • Custom color.
  • Ajax load more post.
  • Ajax load post comments.
  • Ajax comments reply .
  • Featured post marker.
  • Social Share button.
  • Click to zoom view for readers.
  • Support all update browsers including IE 8
  • Support any themes

Pro Version Features

  • Create Unlimited Timelines
  • Display Any Post Types Or Categories
  • Customize with your own colors
  • Hide or Display Post Details
  • Super Responsive
  • Mobile Compatibility View
  • Use via shortcode
  • Expandable(Ajax) load more post.
  • Expandable(Ajax) Ajax load post comments
  • Instant(Ajax) comments reply
  • Featured post marker
  • Social Share button
  • Show /Hide Social Share button
  • Two Different Avatar Style (Round & Square)
  • Click to zoom view for readers.
  • Support all update browsers including IE 8
  • Supports any themes
sections.installation:
1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your Pluings setting via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. After successfully activated you will see a menu “Timeline Pro” left sidebar on dashaboard.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Fix shortcode Issues.
  • Fix CSS Issues.

1.1

  • removed shortcode attributes.

1.0

  • Initial release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your Pluings setting via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. After successfully activated you will see a menu “Timeline Pro” left sidebar on dashaboard.
